MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.00pm to make repairs to an underground cable fault near to Stoneykirk Road substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.33am on 29th October 2020.
